jQuery('#registerflow').text(JSON.stringify(registerFlow)); ]]>falsex_8821_node_readme.do To get this working you'll need a server/computer you can install node.js on and node-red on. Once installed, run node-red, then navigate to the server's ip address + :1880 (e.g. 192.168.1.10:1880). Press "Ctrl+I" and paste the register command from this article. Modify the config box to have your instance, and basic authorization (user will need the *node role. Click the input square to register your server. Check that the server is now listed in the Node-Red application servers. Go back to the node-red page (192.168...:1880) and add a new flow. Copy the Command flow from here and do a (Ctrl+I) to bring that in. Again modify the config block with your basic authorization. That's it your done. If a server appears offline, change the status to "Up" a heartbeat message will be sent every minute to verify ther server is up. Clustering works as you would expect it would. Register NodeRed Server
Run Commands from Instances

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_546dd6840f6ed600f37f4d9ce1050e8e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>all</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	//gs.info(request);
	// implement resource here
	//get server sys_id
	//get cluster sys_ids
	//get queued records
	var returnObj = {};
	var serial = request.queryParams.serial[0];
	var JSON = new global.JSON();
	//https://dev13941.service-now.com/x_8821_node_server_list.do?sysparm_query=serial%3D000000001ef10347%0A
	var server = new GlideRecord('x_8821_node_server');
	server.addQuery('serial', serial);
	server.addQuery('active', true);
	server.query();
	if(server.next()){
		returnObj.server = server.sys_id.toString();
		//"text": JSON.encode(request.queryParams)
	} else {
		returnObj.server = {
			error : 'No records found',
			query : server.getEncodedQuery()
		};
	}
	var m2m = new GlideRecord('x_8821_node_m2m_servers_clusters');
	m2m.addEncodedQuery('cluster.active=true');
	m2m.addEncodedQuery('server.serial=' + serial);
	m2m.query();
	if (m2m.hasNext()) {
		returnObj.clusters = [];
		while(m2m.next()){
			returnObj.clusters.push(
				m2m.cluster.sys_id.toString()
			);
		}
		returnObj.clusters = returnObj.clusters.toString();
	} else {
		returnObj.cluster = {
			error : 'No records found',
			query : m2m.getEncodedQuery()
		};
	}
	//x_8821_node_queue_list.do?
	//sysparm_query=status%3Dexecuted%5Ecluster%3Da1835ac00f6ed600f37f4d9ce1050e8e%5Eserver%3D9eee42800f6ed600f37f4d9ce1050edb
	var query = 'status=pending^server=' + returnObj.server + '^ORclusterIN' + returnObj.clusters;
	var queue = new GlideRecord('x_8821_node_queue');
	queue.addEncodedQuery(query);
	queue.orderBy('sys_created_on');
	queue.orderBy('order');
	queue.query();
	returnObj.queue = [];
	returnObj.qquery = queue.getEncodedQuery();
	while(queue.next()){
		returnObj.queue.push({
			sys_id: queue.sys_id.toString(),
			command: queue.command.toString(),
			queue: queue.queue.toString()
		});
	}
	// implement resource here;
	response.setContentType('application/json');
	response.getStreamWriter().writeString(JSON.encode(returnObj));
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_8821_node/server/all</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/all</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-29 07:46:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>546dd6840f6ed600f37f4d9ce1050e8e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>all</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Node-Red" source="x_8821_node">bceee1930f52d600f37f4d9ce1050e43</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Node-Red">bceee1930f52d600f37f4d9ce1050e43</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_546dd6840f6ed600f37f4d9ce1050e8e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-03-31 06:33:23</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="server">323d96840f6ed600f37f4d9ce1050eb0</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_db6ec47c0fa61a00f37f4d9ce1050ef2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Heartbeat Node Servers</name><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:01:00</run_period><run_start>2016-03-31 05:15:00</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[var server = new GlideRecord('x_8821_node_server');
server.addEncodedQuery('active=true^status=up');
server.orderBy('name');
server.query();
while(server.next()){
	if(server.status == 'up'){
		var queue = new GlideRecord('x_8821_node_queue');
		queue.initialize();
		queue.queue = 'heartbeat';
		if(server.os == 'linux') {
			queue.command = "ifconfig";
		} else {
			queue.command = 'dir';
		}
		queue.server = server.sys_id;
		queue.insert();

		var oneminuteago = new GlideDateTime();
		oneminuteago.addSeconds(-60);
		var updated = new GlideDateTime(server.sys_updated_on);
		if(oneminuteago.compareTo(updated) === 1){
			//e.g. oneminago 12:01a
			//e.g. updatedon 12:00a
			//1
			server.status = 'down';
			gs.info(server.getDisplayValue() + ' last updated on: ' + updated.getDisplayValue());
		}
		server.update();

	} 
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-31 05:20:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>db6ec47c0fa61a00f37f4d9ce1050ef2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Heartbeat Node Servers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Node-Red" source="x_8821_node">bceee1930f52d600f37f4d9ce1050e43</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Node-Red">bceee1930f52d600f37f4d9ce1050e43</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_db6ec47c0fa61a00f37f4d9ce1050ef2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-03-31 06:18:14</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>
